name: Blooming Heart
description: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs

name: Crystal Heart
description: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s. Movement Speed is reduced by 50% and damage incoming is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.
unlock: Reach the final area and turn the facility on.

name: Decayed Heart
description: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

name: Enlarged Heart
description: Innate Double Use Speed. One use, heals 140 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved

name: Lifeless Heart
description: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled

name: Pulsing Heart
description: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 23 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.

name: Quilted Heart
description: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

name: Reprocessed Heart
description: On use, converts 5 Health as Grey Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for both weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

name: Resonating Heart
description: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhealed Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s

name: Ripened Heart
description: On.use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

name: Runed Heart
description: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s for both weapons.

name: Salvaged Heart
description: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.
unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Lumenite Crystal, 15 Relic Dust, 1500 Scrap

name: Shielded Heart
description: On use, grants a SHIELD for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until SHIELD is removed by damage.
unlock:
Find your way to the back of a statue that is located at the hall where E.D. Alpha is encountered to insert a Stellar-Powered Cell at the back of the statue, it's not reachable from the ground. You must make your way around to a higher level around the backside area of the statue, find an elevator, trigger it to go up but don't jump on it, it will reveal a hole underneath, jump down to access the slot and insert a Stellar-Powered Cell.
This will open a door on the side of the main hall, go through it.

name: Siphon Heart
description: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.

name: Tormented Heart
description: Innate 20% Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 240 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.

name: Tranquil Heart
description: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.
unlock: Crafted by giving Nimue a Tormented Heart

name: Unsullied Heart
description: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.

name: Void Heart
description: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.
